overview: A young gentleman feels sorry for his younger brother and his wife who try to have children every day. His sister-in-law had a heart for him who is more caring to her, than her husband who usually treats her harshly, and when the young man found out about this, he hurriedly leaves his seat. The younger brother gets tired of his wife, who can't have children, and he meets another lover, and he's happy to hear that she's pregnant.
title: Sister-in-law's Imagination Becomes a Reality
